sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from "react"; import tether from '../tether.png' import Airdrop from "./Airdrop.js"; class Main extends Component { render(){ return (
Staking Balance Reward Balance
{window.web3.utils.fromWei(this.props.stakingBalance)} USDT {window.web3.utils.fromWei(this.props.rwdBalance)} RWD
Balance: {window.web3.utils.fromWei(this.props.tetherBalance, 'Ether')}
{this.input= input} } type='text' placeholders='0' required/>
   USDT
{ event.preventDefault() let amount amount= this.input.value.toString() amount = window.web3.utils.toWei(amount, 'Ether') this.props.stakeTokens(amount) }} className='mb-3'>
AIRDROP
) } } export default Main;
